Home.welcomeMessage: Welcome to my personal world a small space brimming with inspiration, creativity, and limitless journeys through the universe of technology.

About.title: About Me
About.description1: Hi, I’m Prasert Nuannim a passionate software developer with a strong interest in modern web technologies, IoT, and AI. I specialize in building intuitive, scalable digital solutions using frameworks like Next.js and React, along with tools such as Tailwind CSS and Node.js.
About.description2: My journey began with over 10 years of experience in IT Support, where I managed and maintained system operations with efficiency and reliability. This solid technical foundation has helped shape my developer mindset combining problem-solving, system thinking, and user-focused design.
About.description3: I’m always open to learning, collaborating, and tackling new challenges that push the boundaries of what technology can do. Let’s connect!
